page.description: This event fires just before a page redirect occurs after data has been submitted (without errors.)

discussion.p: This event can be used to dynamically compute the target page to open on redirect.
This event will only fire if the 'Target Page' property in the 'Update Settings' pane is set to: <Event>
This event must set the e.URL property. The e.URL property is redirect's target URL.

description.p: You can also set state variables in this event. The value of any state variables will be available in all subsequent ajax callbacks (in the e.__si2 object).
